com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service

Class WatsonService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assistant, Conversation, Discovery, LanguageTranslator, LanguageTranslator, NaturalLanguageClassifier, NaturalLanguageUnderstanding, PersonalityInsights, SpeechToText, TextToSpeech, ToneAnalyzer, VisualRecognition

    public abstract class WatsonService
extends java.lang.Object
    Watson service abstract common functionality of various Watson Services. It handle authentication and default url.
    See Also:
    IBM Watson Developer Cloud

        public static boolean isJsonMimeType(java.lang.String mimeType)

        Parameters:
        mimeType - the mimetype to consider
        Returns:
        true if the mimeType indicates a JSON-related content type

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setIamCredentials

        public void setIamCredentials(IamOptions iamOptions)
        Sets IAM information. Be aware that if you pass in an access token using this method, you accept responsibility for managing the access token yourself. You must set a new access token before this one expires. Failing to do so will result in authentication errors after this token expires.
        Parameters:
        iamOptions - object containing values to be used for authenticating with IAM
